array::operator[] (2 of 2 overloads)

Access an element.

Synopsis 
value const&
operator[](
    std::size_t pos) const;
Description

Returns a reference to the element specified at location pos. No bounds checking is performed.

Precondition

pos < size()

Complexity

Constant.

Parameters

Name

Description

pos

A zero-based index
